column3: When the youth of America gets together, amazing things happen.

It's amazing what ordinary people can do if they set out without preconceived notions.
I love Jessica Simpson. I love her voice. She's amazing.
I'm proud of the U.S.A. We've done some amazing things. To wear our flag in the Olympics is an honor.
If it's an amazing role, I'll do anything.
As a kid, I kind of spent my life being amazed by being tricked. I love being tricked. I still love it today.
Nothing amazes me anymore.
It was amazing to me that, all of a sudden, I was hearing my music on the radio and coming out of cars.
